On the 11th Feb 2011 I got a new program on my computer called Steam after seeing a game called Team Fortress 2, which I got on the same day I got Steam. It's now 6 years and this game remains my favourite game of all time (along with the half life series)!

Even if the continued development/advancement has not been bumped to the community's highest expectations it still remains an incredible game. I highly recommend giving it a try if you've enjoyed another source engine game or even trying out games that have been inspirations in the gaming world - with this game having so much lovable charisma

welcome to salt fortress 2. after nine years of development, and another few years of ruining COUGH COUGH i mean... uh... updating the game with new features! overall. this game is starting to become bad, but it hasent hit rock bottom... yet.

GOOD THINGS:
claim territory (mainly just certain walls) with sprays.
9 different classes, and different ways to play them.
loads of weapons.
voice chat.
raging COD kids.
sprays!
taunts.
hats.
sprays.
still better than overwatch.
did i forget to mention sprays?

BAD THINGS:
the salty players
wait your match update
hey where did quickplay go?
certain types of sprays. (fnaf, troll, etc.)
where are the new weapons?
12 engineer sentry nests.
and cringeworthy stupidity levels of most beginners and bots.
its a pretty good game. could get some improvements though
офигеная игра и очень угарная советую поигравть в неё

評分:✰✰✰✰✰

時數:15

內容:雙方分為紅藍兩隊，每隊玩家有9種兵種可以選擇，比如像是偵察兵、醫療兵、火焰兵和間諜等，多樣化的武器，讓單一兵種有更多玩法，模式有很多，有推車、佔點和足球！？等，如果這些模式還不夠還可以去社群伺服器遊玩，還有這遊戲的成就還真的是多的讓你破不完...

心得:新手可能剛玩不到2小時就刪遊戲了，這也不是沒有原因，畢竟這款遊戲老手...太多了，不過我還是忍了下來，，當你玩超過5小時相信你就會體驗到遊戲的精髓，真正好玩的地方是殺戮的快感(因為屍塊會亂噴)，但是要殺戮也要看技術，裝備的搭配和遊戲的熟悉度是非常重要的，推薦和朋友一起玩!
